attributes.name: preview-api
attributes.description: The URL to query for HTML previews. Lime Editor will send POST queries to it.

attributes.name: autosave-key
attributes.description:
A key used to store auto-saved text in the local storage, for users to avoid loosing their work
in case of browser crash.

properties.name: previewApi
properties.description: The URL to query for HTML previews. Lime Editor will send POST queries to it.

properties.name: autosaveKey
properties.description:
A key used to store auto-saved text in the local storage, for users to avoid loosing their work
in case of browser crash.
